actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 19 of the Federal Reserve Act and section 18 of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to provide for the payment of interest on deposits of public funds by the United States.

summary.text: Revises the Federal Reserve Act and the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to provide for the payment of interest by Member banks and insured banks under such Acts on deposits of public funds by the United States at a rate of not less than one percentage point below the Federal funds rate.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 19 of the Federal Reserve Act and section 18 of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to provide for the payment of interest on deposits of public funds by the United States.
